Class WheelSettingsTvRef

java.lang.Object
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.JoltPhysicsObject
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.template.Ref
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.WheelSettingsTvRef
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstJoltPhysicsObject, ConstSerializableObject, ConstWheelSettings, ConstWheelSettingsTv, AutoCloseable, Comparable<JoltPhysicsObject>
public final class WheelSettingsTvRef extends Ref implements ConstWheelSettingsTv
A counted reference to a WheelSettingsTv object. (native type: Ref<WheelSettingsTV>)

      Alter where to apply tire forces. (native attribute: mEnableSuspensionForcePoint)
      Parameters:
      enable - true to apply at the configured suspension-force point, false to apply at the wheel's point of contact (default=false)

      the current reference, for chaining
